title: AEX2013
author: AEX2013
content: AEX Global announced the issue of 1 million USD AEX Bear Fund to provide solutions for industry insiders and help their community members to survive in the bear market. KOLs/Influncers/Affiliates/Ambassadors from worldwide can apply for the AEX Bear Fund with their branding proposal, with up to 10,000 USDT for one promotion campaign. First come, first served!AEX Partners can apply for the AEX Bear Fund in the google form:  [Suspicious link removed]/38AZSEwAEX Team will verify the applications every day and get back to the partners after the branding proposal is verified. After the promotion details are confirmed with partners, the AEX Bear Fund will be sent to the address provided.What your can get:1.AEX Bear Fund(0 cost)2.More followers and their loyalty3.Brand exposureWhat is your best strategy in the promotion?  Apply for the AEX Fund with a twitter/Facebook/Telegram promotion proposal now!In May, AEX Global proposed a global brand strategy upgrade to build a perfect global financial system as its mission, and officially announced the creation of an international "digital life service provider" to provide safe, perfect and easy diversified wealth management services for one billion people. In the future, AEX Global will launch various special support funds according to market conditions, so that users can get the opportunity to increase their wealth whether in bear or bull markets!About AEX GlobalFounded in 2013, AEX, a cryptocurrency finance exchange, is committing to providing billions of people with safe, complete, easy, and diversified digital finance management services. The closer you look, the further you see. AEX offers a wide range of scenarios covering many fields, including Fiat, Spot, Finance, Loan, and Mining. In AEX Earn, there are Fixed Savings, Flexible Savings, DeFi, Staking, and Dual Investment to meet users' demands. AEX Earn is leading the world in coin type and APR, providing users with rich earning channels.Follow us：Twitter: https://twitter.com/Aexglobal Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AEX-Global-105142075176078 Medium: https://aexglobal.medium.com/
